hackathons.name: Genaiversity Hackathon
hackathons.description: Participated in the Genaiversity AI-focused hackathon, working on innovative generative AI solutions. Collaborated with talented developers to build cutting-edge AI applications and explore the latest in machine learning and artificial intelligence technologies.

hackathons.name: Monad Blitz Hackathon
hackathons.description: Competed in the Monad Blitz hackathon, a Web3 blockchain development competition focused on building high-performance decentralized applications on the Monad blockchain. Worked on creating innovative smart contracts and exploring Layer 1 blockchain solutions.

hackathons.name: Jupiverse Hackathon by HyderabadDAO
hackathons.description: Participated in the Jupiverse hackathon organized by HyderabadDAO, focusing on Web3 innovation and decentralized applications. Built solutions leveraging blockchain technology and explored DeFi protocols, NFTs, and decentralized governance systems.

hackathons.name: Mahindra University Aeon Fest Hackathon
hackathons.description: Competed in the Aeon Fest hackathon at Mahindra University, a premier Web3 and blockchain development competition. Worked on innovative decentralized solutions and collaborated with industry experts to build next-generation blockchain applications.
